informal_statement:
How many integer values of $x$ satisfy $|x|<3\pi$?

$\textbf{(A)} ~9 \qquad\textbf{(B)} ~10 \qquad\textbf{(C)} ~18 \qquad\textbf{(D)} ~19 \qquad\textbf{(E)} Show that it is \textbf{(D)} ~19.
informal_proof: Since $3\pi\approx9.42$, we multiply $9$ by $2$ for the integers from $1$ to $9$ and the integers from $-1$ to $-9$ and add $1$ to account for $0$ to get $\textbf{(D)} ~19$.
formal_code:
(*
  Authors: Wenda Li
*)

theory amc12b_2021_p1
  imports Complex_Main 
begin


theorem amc12b_2021_p1:
  shows "card {x::int. \<bar>real_of_int x\<bar> < 3 * pi} = 19"
  sorry

end
